Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

TargetArn.description: The ARN of the target the phone number is claimed to.
TargetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the target the phone number is claimed to.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:(instance|traffic-distribution-group)/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  

Update requires: No interruption

PhoneNumberArn.markdownDescription:
The phone number ARN

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:phone-number/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  

Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: The description of the phone number.
Description.markdownDescription:
The description of the phone number.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 500   

Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: The phone number type, either TOLL_FREE or DID.
Type.markdownDescription:
The phone number type, either TOLL_FREE or DID.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: TOLL_FREE|DID  

Update requires: No interruption

CountryCode.markdownDescription:
The phone number country code.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^[A-Z]{2}  

Update requires: No interruption

Prefix.markdownDescription:
The phone number prefix.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^\+[0-9]{1,15}  

Update requires: No interruption

Address.markdownDescription:
The phone number e164 address.

---

Required: No

Type: string    

Pattern: ^\+[0-9]{2,15}  

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
One or more tags.

---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
